title: Idea Generation & Validation Quiz
description: Test your understanding of idea generation and validation techniques

questions.question: The best business ideas often come from:
questions.explanation: Ideas that solve personal problems are often the most authentic and have a clear target audience.

questions.question: What is the first step in idea validation?
questions.explanation: Getting feedback from potential customers is crucial before investing resources in development.

questions.question: A good brainstorming session should:
questions.explanation: Effective brainstorming encourages quantity and delays judgment to foster creativity.

questions.question: When identifying problems to solve, look for:
options: Problems that are impossible to solve
questions.explanation: Frequently occurring frustrations indicate a larger market opportunity.

questions.question: The main purpose of idea validation is to:
questions.explanation: Validation helps reduce risk by testing assumptions before major investments.
